text: Ej mardum, az Parvardigoraton parvo kuned va az ruze ʙitarsed, ki na hec padare ʙaroi farzandas sude dorad va na hec farzande sudrasoni padar ast. Jaqinan, va'dai Alloh taolo [dar mavridi qijomat] haqiqat dorad. Pas, [husjor ʙosed, ki lazzathoi] zindagii dunjoi sumoro nafireʙad va sajton nisʙat ʙa [ta'xiri azoʙ va sikeʙoii] Alloh taolo fireʙaton nadihad
